plot: A successful female mystery author in a vulnerable stage of her life falls for a murky ex-con. Her life slowly starts to resemble one of her darker novels and that's not a good thing.
title: The Wednesday Woman
plot_es: A successful female mystery author in a vulnerable stage of her life falls for a murky ex-con. Her life slowly starts to resemble one of her darker novels and that's not a good thing.
plot_en: A successful female mystery author in a vulnerable stage of her life falls for a murky ex-con. Her life slowly starts to resemble one of her darker novels and that's not a good thing.
